name: Re:Vessel
description:
(EPILEPSY WARNING) contains flashing imagery 

This game is a work in progress, everything is subject to change, however the ending is complete and the game can be beaten.

Re:Vessel is a Yume Nikki fangame mostly solo developed by me. I encourage feedback and bug reports to improve this game.

Arrow keys to move, Z to interact, X to open the menu. Save your game at the desk. Interact with your door to explore your house at night
